title: David Littleproud's flip flop on climate science – video
text: Australia's minister responsible for drought and natural disasters, David Littleproud, has made contradictory statements days apart over his acceptance of manmade climate change. Earlier in the week, he told Guardian Australia and ABC Radio National that he didn't know if climate change was manmade. When grilled during question time in the House of Representative on Thursday he contended that he 'always had' believed the science, adding: 'I'm just a poor humble bloke with a Year 12 education but I'm prepared to accept what our scientists are telling us'
description: Australian natural disasters minister has a complete about face over his acceptance of manmade climate change
